title: Lights, Camera, Smacktion with Lucas Tyson
description:
Throwing Fits is pleased to report we fucked around and found out. This week we’re dialing in the man with the golden voice, the literal big homie, Lucas “Topshelf” Tyson, for a pod so buttery smooth you might slip and hurt yourself if you’re not careful. Lucas hits the 1s and 2s to spin some raw, uncut realness on big and tall jawnz, Getting Active™, grassroots organizing, chefing up to give back, his radical family history, being mixed race, racism in nightlife, 2020’s evolution of the flex, getting absolutely smacked in quarantine, baby making music and much more.
 
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits.
dc:creator: Throwing Fits
